items.name: Greek omelet
items.description: 2 eggs, 2 ounces feta cheese, 1 cup spinach leaves, 2 ounces sliced black olives

items.name: Green Pepper Steak with Rice
items.description: White Chocolate Dream Bar with 1 cup strawberries

items.name: Chicken breast with melted mozzarella
items.description: 1 cup roasted asparagus with 1 teaspoon olive oil, Chocolate Chip Protein Cookie and ½ banana

items.name: Breakfast sandwich
items.description: 1 slice cheddar, 1 cooked egg, and turkey or vegetarian breakfast sausage on Protein Pancakes

items.name: Spicy Chicken Oriental Protein Entrée
items.description: 1 cup cooked eggplant and zucchini with 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1 cup watermelon

items.name: Stuffed acorn squash
items.description: 1 roasted acorn squash in halves, stuffed with a mixture of ½ cup cottage cheese, 1 ounce parmesan, ½ cup cooked frozen or fresh spinach, and garlic powder and black pepper to taste

items.name: Protein Oatmeal
items.description: 2 tablespoons peanut butter and 1 sliced apple

items.name: Lettuce leaf wraps
items.description: ½ cup fat free refried beans, 3 ounces shredded chicken breast with Tex-Mex Flavor, and 1 ounce melted cheddar

items.name: Sloppy Joe Protein Entrée
items.description: with ½ cup Italian style stewed tomatoes on a high-fiber whole wheat bun Side salad with lettuce, tomatoes, 1 ounce shredded cheese, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinaigrette Chocolate Protein Pudding

items.name: Breakfast Parfait
items.description: Honey Nut Protein Cereal, 1 ounce sliced almonds, ½ cup cottage cheese, and ½ cup each of strawberries and blueberries

items.name: Vegetable Lasagna
items.description: 1 cup carrot sticks, 2 tablespoons peanut butter

items.name: Greek burger
items.description: 1 veggie burger patty (or lean ground turkey), 2 ounces feta cheese, 1 small zucchini, sliced and grilled with 1 teaspoon olive oil, and oregano, all in a whole-wheat pita pocket or hamburger bun, Protein Cocoa

items.name: Smoothie
items.description: 1 banana, 1 container vanilla Greek yogurt, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 1 cup frozen fruit (such as peaches or berries)

items.name: Salad
items.description: 1/3 cup whole grain couscous, ½ cup garbanzo beans, 1 cup diced veggies such as onion, bell pepper, tomato, and celery, 3 ounces grilled diced chicken breast, 2 tablespoons Italian dressing

items.name: Broiled salmon
items.description: 4 ounces broiled salmon with Asian Inspired Flavor Sauce 1 cup steamed green beans with 1 ounce almonds 1 cup strawberries

items.name: Cinnamon Vanilla Protein Cereal
items.description: 1 banana, sliced, 1 ounce walnuts, and 1 container Greek yogurt

items.name: Whole-grain pita
items.description: 2 tablespoons hummus, 1 ounce provolone or mozzarella cheese, and 1 cup fresh sprouts, lettuce, or other veggies Protein Potato Chips

items.name: Chicken Pasta
items.description: 1 cup steamed broccoli florets, Double Chocolate Cake with 1 cup raspberries

items.name: Vegetable Protein Omelet
items.description: 2 ounces lean turkey breakfast sausage patties, 1 medium potato in cubes, roasted with 2 teaspoons olive oil

items.name: Roll-ups
items.description: 3 ounces all-natural turkey breast slices and 1 ounce swiss cheese, spread with 1 ounce non-fat cream cheese, dotted with 1 ounce walnuts, rolled around matchsticks of veggies such as bell peppers, cucumbers, and carrots 2 small clementines

items.name: Protein Pasta Fettuccine
items.description: tossed with 1 ounce cashews, 1 cup cooked veggies such as broccoli florets, sugar snap peas, and carrot slices, and VLC Pasta Sauce of your choice
